title: Add fsnotify watcher for ~/.claude/tasks/
description:
Add a new fsnotify watcher in the tickboard server that watches ~/.claude/tasks/ directory for changes.

Requirements:
- Watch the tasks root directory for new task list folders (UUIDs)
- Watch each task list folder for .json file changes
- Handle task list folders being created/deleted
- Debounce rapid changes (100ms like existing watchers)

Files:
- internal/tickboard/server/server.go - Add tasksWatcher field and initialization
- internal/tickboard/server/tasks_watcher.go (new) - Task watching logic

Test:
- Manually create/modify files in ~/.claude/tasks/ and verify events fire
acceptance_criteria: Watcher detects task file changes and logs them
